title: Michael Clark
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809050300/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809050300/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Michael Clark**

Michael Clark is a calligraphic [lettering artist](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809050300/http:/typophile.com/wiki/lettering%20artist) who resides in Richmond, [Virginia](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809050300/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Virginia). His work entails creation of logo designs, titling for CDs, Books and magazines as well as font development for both corporations and independent foundries.

Typefaces by Michael Clark: [Frenzy](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809050300/http:/www.p22.com/ihof/frenzy.html), [Pooper Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809050300/http:/www.p22.com/ihof/pooper.html), [Shibumi](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809050300/http:/www.p22.com/ihof/shibumi.html), [Monumental Titling](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809050300/http:/www.p22.com/ihof/font.asp?font=monumentaltitling&face=monumentaltitling), [Peanut](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809050300/http:/www.p22.com/ihof/font.asp?font=peanut&face=peanutotset), [Sting](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809050300/http:/www.p22.com/ihof/font.asp?font=sting&face=sting), [Sweepy](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809050300/http:/www.p22.com/ihof/font.asp?font=sweepy&face=sweepyot)
author: paul d hunt
